title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
We're looking for a highly skilled Senior Business Analyst to join our team and play a vital role in optimizing business processes and systems. You will collaborate with stakeholders, manage requirements, and leverage your expertise in business analysis and insurance solutions to drive project success.

Responsibilities



Bridge communication between stakeholders and ensure expectations are met
Develop, document, and maintain business analysis artifacts
Plan and execute business analysis activities efficiently
Conduct in-depth requirements analysis and oversee change management
Identify opportunities for process improvements and provide strategic recommendations
Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless project execution
Assess current business analysis approaches and suggest areas for enhancement
Participate in occasional late meetings when required



Requirements



At least 3 years of experience in business analysis
Strong stakeholder management and communication skills
Expertise in documenting BA artifacts and planning analysis activities
In-depth knowledge of requirements analysis and change management
Hands-on experience with EIS ClaimCore v12
Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities
English proficiency at B2+ level
Familiarity with insurance industry processes



Nice to have



Experience working with EIS Solutions
Proven ability to improve business analysis workflows
Creative approach to solving complex business challenges
Willingness to facilitate late meetings when necessary



We offer



International projects with top brands
Work with global teams of highly skilled, diverse peers
Healthcare benefits
Employee financial programs
Paid time off and sick leave
Upskilling, reskilling and certification courses
Unlimited access to the LinkedIn Learning library and 22,000+ courses
Global career opportunities
Volunteer and community involvement opportunities
EPAM Employee Groups
Award-winning culture recognized by Glassdoor, Newsweek and LinkedIn
